Uses of Package
org.apache.sis.portrayal

Packages that use org.apache.sis.portrayal
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
Widgets showing GridCoverage images or sample values.
org.apache.sis.gui.map
Widgets for showing a map in a JavaFX application.
org.apache.sis.portrayal
Symbology and map representations, together with a rendering engine for display.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.portrayal used by org.apache.sis.gui.coverage
    Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Common abstraction for implementations that manage the display and user manipulation of spatial graphic elements.
    Observable
    Parent class of all objects for which it is possible to register listeners.
    PlanarCanvas
    A canvas for two-dimensional display device using a Cartesian coordinate system.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.portrayal used by org.apache.sis.gui.map
    Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Common abstraction for implementations that manage the display and user manipulation of spatial graphic elements.
    CanvasFollower
    A listener of displacements in a source canvas which can reproduce the same displacement in a target canvas.
    Observable
    Parent class of all objects for which it is possible to register listeners.
    PlanarCanvas
    A canvas for two-dimensional display device using a Cartesian coordinate system.
    RenderException
    Thrown when a map rendering process failed.
    TransformChangeEvent
    A change in the "objective to display" transform that Canvas uses for rendering data.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.portrayal used by org.apache.sis.portrayal
    Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Common abstraction for implementations that manage the display and user manipulation of spatial graphic elements.
    Observable
    Parent class of all objects for which it is possible to register listeners.
    PlanarCanvas
    A canvas for two-dimensional display device using a Cartesian coordinate system.
    RenderException
    Thrown when a map rendering process failed.
    TransformChangeEvent
    A change in the "objective to display" transform that Canvas uses for rendering data.
    TransformChangeEvent.Reason
    The reason why the "objective to display" transform changed.
